title.rendered: How much does robotic process automation cost?

<meta name="description" content="How much does robotic process automation cost? Depending on your goals, the required engineering efforts, and RPA vendor pricing, you could spend anything between $5,000 and $300,000 for a full-fledged RPA system." />
